mention.text: A summer noon of patriotism is burning overhead
no word of clique or clan
he who would work it harm , Let him , although a brother , beware our strong right arm
sacred ; he who would work it harm , Let him , although a brother , beware our strong right arm
the boon that patriot hearts have prayed and waited for
Massachusetts blood the first for Freedom shed
